details.title: Business Development and Data Analysis
details.description: Researched and analyzed thousands of companies to identify ideal customer profile (ICP) matches for targeted outreach strategies. Performed manual QA testing to verify website functionality and ensure optimal user experience.

details.title: Lead Qualification Process
details.description: Collaborated with an international team to refine lead qualification processes and improve conversion rates. Utilized business intelligence tools to manage prospect data and track client engagement.

details.title: Staff Scheduling and Resource Allocation
details.description: Coordinated complex staff scheduling across multiple game types and developed solutions for unexpected staffing challenges and operational disruptions.

details.title: Communication and Team Management
details.description: Served as a liaison between management and game presenters, facilitating clear communication and improving prioritization skills while handling multiple concurrent responsibilities.
